title: How many songs does 16 GB hold? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are variables, how long are the songs, what sort of encoding will be used, what bit rate but that all said the 16gb pen drive plugged into my car has the following attributes Average length about 3 minutes, encoded as mp3, bit rate differs but nothing below 128kbps it's for playing in a car and my ears aren't as good as they were 40 or 50 years ago but the average is probably 192 kbps. There are 2661 tracks on the drive and, if I remember right, 3 or 4 gb spare space so maxed out I'd expect a little under 3500 tracks.

Depends on the length of the songs and format and resolution of the audio files. If an average song is 4 minutes long, 16GB will hold around 377 uncompressed .wav files, oraround 1666 high quality (320kbps) mp3s, oraround 2777 medium quality (192kbps) mp3s, oraround 4166 low quality (128kbps) mp3sCalculated with Audio File Size Calculator
